article_title: 'Such an outpouring of fear, anger and despair' - UN human rights chief.
sentence: The  UN's  high  commissioner  for  human  rights  says  that  one  in  every  57  people  living  in  the  Gaza  Strip  "has  been  killed  or  wounded  in  the  past  five  weeks",  based  on  Hamas-run  health  ministry  figures.
